local_intent: Release the white carton by opening the gripper at contact and confirm it is no longer held.
assumptions: End-effector is already lowered to table contact from prior steps
coherence_with_global: Implements the OpenGripper phase of the global place sequence, using the same width and confirming release by checking not ObjectInGripper after opening; requires prior contact consistent with LowerUntilContact(force_threshold=5).
